Articles.Content:
Hello,

I've modded my game long time ago and since there were patches in between the mods went outdated.
I threw some incompatible mods out, updated every still compatible mods and added a few new mods,

then I started a new game and crashed every now and then, especially when switching between buildings, sometimes even on the loading-screen.

 

I'm using CKAN to keep track of my mods, so here is my CKAN export file for you:

	"kind": "metapackage",

I really don't even know where to start, I was hoping someone had more experience with all the mods out there and would see some conflicts or broken mods right away, because if I tried to figure it out, it would probably take a week until I'm done reading through every single mod file, experimented with every single mod just to maybe find out that the game itself may be unstable right now.

 

I've tried launching through CKAN, 64bit seems to be even more unstable and launching normal through steam doesn't make it much better either.

Edited January 17, 2018 by Kernyx

Can you provide the logs?

If you don't know how to find them there are instructions here:

dropbox link

Edited January 18, 2018 by Kernyx
